main_definition: Pants refer to a type of clothing that covers the lower body, typically from waist down to ankles, worn by both men and women.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Used to express surprise or disbelief
meanings_and_examples.example: You can't be serious? You actually ate the whole pizza?

meanings_and_examples.definition: To expose oneself, usually in an embarrassing manner
meanings_and_examples.example: He decided to pants at his girlfriend when she wasn't looking.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A measurement unit equal to 16 or 18 inches (40.64 cm or 45.72 cm) in length
meanings_and_examples.example: The width of the board is exactly six pants wide.
